message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLECONTACT_FV_PHONE_EMPTY
message.locale: Phone number invalid. Phone number cannot be blank.

message.name: ERR_CONTACT_FV_PHONE_EMPTY
message.locale: Contact phone number invalid. Contact phone number cannot be blank.

message.name: ERR_XRV_PRIMARYPHONE
message.locale: You cannot cancel the primary phone number.

message.name: ERR_CONTACT_XFV_COUNTRYCODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Contact phone number must be entered if Country Code is entered.

message.name: ERR_CONTACT_XFV_AREACODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Contact phone number must be entered if Area Code is entered.

message.name: ERR_CONTACT_XFV_EXTENSION_EMPTY
message.locale: Contact phone number must be entered if extension number is entered.

message.name: ERR_CONTACTPHONE_FV_SHORT
message.locale: Phone number invalid. Phone Number entries must have at least 3 digits.
